description: 14 months after going to prison on federal weapons charges Jax, Clay and the other SAMCRO members are released and return to Charming where they encounter new enemies in the form of a no nonsense sheriff and an Assistant U.S. Attorney out to nail the club for their dealings with Russian gunrunner Putlova. Also Jax makes a promise to Tara and Opie and Lyla get married.
title: Out

description: After exacting their revenge, SAMCRO is forced to make a decision that could cause a huge shift in the club.
title: Booster

description: SAMCRO encounters an unlikely foe when a piece of their business goes missing.
title: Dorylus

description: SAMCRO makes a run to set up a new business venture with their Tucson charter, SAMTAZ while Gemma makes a new ally in town with Police Chief Roosevelt's wife, Rita.
title: Una Venta

description: SAMCRO enlists a former foe to help stop the advancement of Charming Heights, while the Sheriff presses Juice for more information.
title: Brick

description: SAMCRO’s relationship with the Cartel is in jeopardy when an important package is compromised.
title: With an X

description: As Jax searches for who threatened Tara, she becomes aware of what's been going on with the club and warns Jax that Clay can't be trusted.
title: Fruit for the Crows

description: SAMCRO must put off an important vote to deal with an external threat.
title: Family Recipe

description: SAMCRO gets word that the Niners have made a new alliance that directly impacts their own agenda.
title: Kiss

description: Jax and Tara get a glimpse of life without SAMCRO but discover that their reality is hard to escape.
title: Hands

description: SAMCRO faces a powerful adversary that threatens their business with the Cartel.
title: Call of Duty

description: SAMCRO negotiates with the Irish Kings to secure the club's future.
title: Burnt and Purged Away

description: Jax faces a new challenge that threatens his family and SAMCRO.
title: To Be, Act 1

description: Jax must overcome great obstacles as he attempts to finalize the gun deal between the Irish and the cartel.
title: To Be, Act 2
